auth.signInWithTelegram: Sign in with Telegram to start playing

brand.name: FORTUNE CITY
brand.tagline: Spin your fortune. Own the floor.
brand.description: Build your slot machine empire in the neon-lit streets of Fortune City. Buy machines, collect coins, and become the king of the floor.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Manage your slot machine empire
dashboard.taxTooltip: The higher your tier, the lower the tax when withdrawing profit to USDT

shop.title: Machine Shop
shop.subtitle: Buy new slot machines
shop.pageSubtitle: Purchase new slot machines to grow your empire
shop.unlockHint: Unlock new tiers by purchasing machines one level at a time.
shop.lowBalanceWarning: Your balance will be low after this purchase

reinvest.penaltyWarningTitle: Repeat purchase of the same tier
reinvest.penaltyWarningText: This is your {round}{ordinal} machine of this tier. Profit reduced by {percent}%.
reinvest.upgradeTip: Tip: Upgrade to Tier {tier} for full profit!
reinvest.newTierText: First purchase of this tier — you'll get maximum profit with no penalties!
reinvest.penaltyTooltip: When you buy the same tier again, profit decreases with each purchase (5% → 10% → ... up to 85%). Move to a higher tier for full profit!
reinvest.newTierTooltip: This is a new tier for you! No penalty applied. Each tier has its own penalty counter.

machines.buyFirstMachine: Buy your first slot machine to start earning $FORTUNE!

riskyCollect.title: Fortune's Gamble
riskyCollect.description: Risk your earnings for a chance to double them, or lose half!
riskyCollect.warning: This action cannot be undone. Gamble responsibly!

autoCollect.title: Auto Collect
autoCollect.activeDescription: Your coins are automatically collected when the Coin Box fills up.
autoCollect.automateDescription: Never miss a collection again. Auto Collect automatically gathers your coins when the Coin Box is full.
autoCollect.howItWorks1: Automatically collects when Coin Box is full
autoCollect.howItWorks3: Module expires when machine cycle ends

coinBoxUpgrade.title: Upgrade Coin Box
coinBoxUpgrade.maxReachedDescription: Your Coin Box has the maximum storage capacity (48 hours).
coinBoxUpgrade.whyUpgradeDesc: Larger capacity means less frequent collections and no income loss when away.

gambleUpgrade.title: Upgrade Fortune's Gamble
gambleUpgrade.maxReachedDescription: You have the best possible odds for Fortune's Gamble.

refs.title: My Referrals
refs.subtitle: Invite friends and earn rewards
refs.shareHint: Share this link with friends. You'll earn a percentage of their machine purchases!
refs.withdrawDescription: Transfer your referral earnings to your main balance
refs.needActiveMachine: You need an active machine to withdraw referral balance
refs.purchaseMachineToUnlock: Purchase at least one machine to unlock withdrawals
refs.shareToStart: Share your link to start earning!
refs.howItWorks4: Bonuses are paid from fresh deposits only
refs.howItWorks5: Active referral = has purchased machine with own funds

reasons.notAvailable: Machine is not available for sale. Wait for cycle to complete.
reasons.pawnshopUnavailable: Pawnshop is not available after breakeven. Auction is your only option.
reasons.noQueue: No queue - your machine will sell on next purchase of this tier.
reasons.pawnshopInstant: Pawnshop offers instant sale. Auction queue is long.

auction.title: P2P Auction
auction.noQueue: No queue - sells on next purchase
auction.warning: Your machine will be queued for P2P sale. You can cancel before it sells.

pawnshop.title: Instant Pawnshop
pawnshop.warning: This action is irreversible. Your machine will be sold immediately.

cash.walletConnectedDeposit: Wallet connected. Select currency and amount.
cash.connectWalletToDeposit: Connect your Solana wallet to deposit
cash.walletConnectedWithdraw: Wallet connected. Enter amount to withdraw.
cash.connectWalletToReceive: Connect your Solana wallet to receive USDT
cash.sendToAddress: Send SOL, USDT, or FORTUNE to this address

importantNotes.onlySend: Only send SOL, USDT (SPL), or FORTUNE tokens
importantNotes.otherTokensLoss: Sending other tokens may result in loss of funds

cash.atomicDescription: You'll sign a transaction that sends a small SOL fee and receives USDT in one atomic operation. Fast and secure!
cash.instantDescription: USDT will be sent directly to your address. No wallet connection required!
cash.makeAddressNote: Make sure this address can receive USDT SPL tokens
cash.pleaseConnectWallet: Please connect wallet and enter amount

metadata.title: Fortune City
metadata.description: Spin your fortune. Own the floor.
